title.rendered: FREE Audiobook + New Toys + Harry Potter

content.rendered:
Free Audiobook: August 5-6

Tomorrow and Saturday, choose one of the following audiobooks with a $10 purchase:

  • Lone Survivor
  • For One More Day
  • Always Looking Up
  • America Again
  • Cross Roads
  • Low Pressure

Limit one per customer, per location, per day.  While quantities last.

New Toys at Gottwals Books

Come check out Fat Brain Toys, now at Gottwals Books. Build and construct colorful and goofy contraptions with Squigz, or challenge yourself with Ivan’s Hinge, the portable and fidgety brain teaser (that our Gottwals sales associates loved to hate when they tried it out)!

Harry Potter and the Cursed Child

We have Harry Potter and the Cursed Child in stock for only $18.97! Remember that you can bring any of our books back for 50% in store credit. Read the New York Times book review here, but beware of some light spoilers.

Harry Potter Contest Winners

Grand Prize: A NEW paperback set of Harry Potter books #1-7
Ellie Noble

Second Prize: A copy of Harry Potter and the Cursed Child
Colbie Caldwell

Third Prize: A Harry Potter coloring book
John Scott

We want to thank everyone for participating. We hope you had as much fun as we did. For those who entered but did not receive one of the top three prizes… you won’t be empty-handed! Stop by one of our locations by August 13 and choose either a Gottwals Books tote bag or a Gottwals Books journal.

Walls of Books: West Chester, Ohio!

We are excited to reveal the next location of our newest Walls of Books: West Chester, Ohio!

Stay tuned for updates about the grand opening!

excerpt.rendered: Tomorrow and Saturday, choose a FREE audiobook with every $10 purchase!
